name: Turnion
description:
A new twist on the falling block puzzle game with innovative gesture based controls.

Draw circles to rotate and swipe to move right, left, or down. Match 4+ in a row to remove blocks. Intuitive play control by TouchCircus.

Turnion - A misspelling of the word ternion.
ternion [tur-nee-uh n] a set or group of three; triad.
turn [turn] to move around on an axis or about a center; rotate.
